channel.title: Tut. request 317 how to allow any client to use my source
channel.description:
ikik 317 sucks blah blah blah... but what ever. my server, i have only been able to get on it with new allgo client bluuur doesnt work, anything. only new allgo client.
any ideas
tut maybe

item.title: Tut. request 317 how to allow any client to use my source
item.dc:creator: @Coelho Coelho
item.description:
@Coelho wrote:

ikik 317 sucks blah blah blah...
317 is a very good revision. The server software you are using is probably horrid though. OT: There is probably a UID verification on login, or some changes in the player/npc updating (for bluurr).

Read full topic
